Clinical Information.Medical use: antimicrobial-peptide-containing mouth wash for the treatment of oral candidiasis (gingivitis and periodontal diseases)
Clinical Information.Company: Demgen and Dow Pharmaceutical Sciences;licensed to the Vancouver, Canada, company Pacgen
Clinical Information.Comments: In a randomised double-blind clinical trial in 106 subjects, histatin derivatives were found to be more effective than placebo in preventing experimental gingivitis

Sequence Information.Source: using a variant of histatins, which are naturally occurring cationic peptides in saliva
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Histatins manifest an in vivo IC50 value of approximately 1.4 Î¼M
Reference: Histatins: antimicrobial peptides with therapeutic potential. J. Pharm. Pharmacol. (2004).(PMID:15025852)
Safety and clinical effects of topical histatin gels in human with experimental gingivitis. J Clin Periodontol (2002)(PMID:12492903)
